--modelname.help: name of the model; data would be stored under <output-path>/<modelname>/

--image-shape.help: width and height of the input images

--channel-count.help: number of channels in the input image data

--label-count.help: number of label values per label image

--network-depth.help: depth parameter of the network architecture

--inputs.help: csv column names of input data

--outputs.help: output definitions for the model in json format '{<name>:{"loss": <loss_fn>, "weight": <loss weight>}}'

--images.help: glob file pattern of a list of images

--masks.help: glob file pattern of a list of masks matching the image names

--num-augs.help: number of augmentations to apply for each input

--data-preprocess-fn.help: name of the data preprocessing function in user.py

--label-preprocess-fn.help: name of the label preprocessing function in user.py

--data-validation-fn.help: name of the data validation function in user.py

--label-validation-fn.help: name of the label validation function in user.py

--batch-size.help: batch size to use in training. NB: only values of 1 are supported
